{{Stub}}

'''Ali Alexander''' (born Ali Akbar) is a right-wing political activist and conspiracy theorist who is most known as a leader of the "[[Stop the Steal]]" campaign, which promoted the false claim that the 2020 presidential election was stolen from [[Donald Trump]].

Alexander was a vocal supporter of Trump and helped organize rallies and events to promote the false claim of voter fraud, including the [[January 6th Insurrection]]. Alexander has been a frequent guest on the [[InfoWars]] various programs.
